entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
